ing: 1 (55 ounce) can baked beans (such as Bush's HomestyleÂ®)
1/4 cup barbeque sauce (such as Jack Daniel'sÂ®)
2 (13 ounce) packages kielbasa sausage, thinly sliced
n: The Big Game Barbeque Meat Chili
des: "Not for the health conscious, but a huge hit with the men in my family while watching football on Sundays. Even better with onions and peppers, but this is the tried-and-true version. Enjoy!"
ins:
Stir baked beans, kidney beans, cannellini beans, barbeque sauce, and brown sugar together in a large bowl.
Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook and stir beef, sweet Italian sausage, and hot Italian sausage in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes; pour meat mixture into a slow cooker. Cook and stir kielbasa in the same skillet over medium-high heat until browned, 5 to 7 minutes; add to slow cooker. Top meats with chopped bacon.
Pour bean mixture over meats in the slow cooker and stir to combine.
Cook on Low for 10 to 12 hours.
